text:
@holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea I've seen techies do presentations in Jedi robes, an elephant masks, clown suits, etc.

It's easy to believe you can wear anything to a tech conference because only skills matters.

That's not true.
Try wearing a suit/dress instead. It immediately signals you as non-technical.

author.name: Geoffrey De Smet
author.description: OptaPlanner creator, Java, open source contributor, speaker, Artificial Intelligence (mathematical optimization, metaheuristics, constraint solving)
